name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora singing 'Blue Disco' while credits scroll on screen.
Transition between songs. Applause and silence.
Tokino Sora performing a fast-paced rock song about daily struggles.

subtitles.original: 明日もまた同じ
subtitles.english: If tomorrow is the same,

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇るなら
subtitles.english: and the morning sun rises again,

subtitles.original: もう... 何もいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need... anything else.

subtitles.original: 青く光る夜が
subtitles.english: The night glowing in blue,

subtitles.original: 星空のミラーボール
subtitles.english: is a mirror ball in the starry sky.

subtitles.original: さあ... 私を照らして
subtitles.english: Come now... shine a light on me.

subtitles.original: タップで地球揺らすくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to shake the earth with a tap,

subtitles.original: ここで踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: let's dance the night away right here.

subtitles.original: 午前5時の夜明けの街で
subtitles.english: In the city at dawn, 5 AM,

subtitles.original: なんか一人ぼっちな気分
subtitles.english: I feel somewhat all alone.

subtitles.original: 埋もれてゆくパレット
subtitles.english: The palette getting buried,

subtitles.original: ぼんやり眺めるベッドで期待してる
subtitles.english: I gaze at it vaguely from bed, hoping for

subtitles.original: 君の足音を
subtitles.english: the sound of your footsteps.

subtitles.original: 触れたくても
subtitles.english: Even if I want to touch,

subtitles.original: 触れられないし
subtitles.english: I can't reach you.

subtitles.original: 運命の赤い
subtitles.english: I don't know anything about

subtitles.original: 糸なんて知らないし
subtitles.english: a red string of fate.

subtitles.original: それでも君と繋がっていたい
subtitles.english: But still, I want to be connected with you.

subtitles.original: 明るくなる空に
subtitles.english: Into the brightening sky,

subtitles.original: この想い乗せても
subtitles.english: even if I send these feelings...

subtitles.original: もう... 何も見えない
subtitles.english: I can't see... anything anymore.

subtitles.original: 灰色に流れる
subtitles.english: Floating in the grey,

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間 差し込む
subtitles.english: shining through the gaps in the clouds.

subtitles.original: さあ... 他人事なんかもう
subtitles.english: Come now... forget about other people's business.

subtitles.original: たっぷり深呼吸して
subtitles.english: Take a deep, deep breath,

subtitles.original: 境界線を越える
subtitles.english: and cross the boundary line.

subtitles.original: 明日もまた同じ
subtitles.english: If tomorrow is the same,

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇るなら
subtitles.english: and the morning sun rises again,

subtitles.original: もう... 何もいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need... anything else.

subtitles.original: 青く光る夜が
subtitles.english: The night glowing in blue,

subtitles.original: 星空のミラーボール
subtitles.english: is a mirror ball in the starry sky.

subtitles.original: さあ... 私を照らして
subtitles.english: Come now... shine a light on me.

subtitles.original: タップで地球揺らすくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to shake the earth with a tap,

subtitles.original: ここで踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: let's dance the night away right here.

subtitles.original: 「なんであなたにはできないの？」なんてさ
subtitles.english: "Why can't you do it?" they say.

subtitles.original: 陰口言われたり 呆れられたり
subtitles.english: Talked about behind my back, looked at with dismay,

subtitles.original: 口角下がるデイズ 手一杯で
subtitles.english: days spent frowning, my hands are full.

subtitles.original: 電車は私を置き去りにしちゃうし
subtitles.english: The train leaves me behind,

subtitles.original: 流行りの野菜もスピード早すぎだね
subtitles.english: Even trendy veggies go bad too fast.

subtitles.original: ありのままの素敵さだけじゃ
subtitles.english: Just being wonderful as I am

subtitles.original: 足りないんだ
subtitles.english: isn't enough.

subtitles.original: 毎日死ぬほど頑張って
subtitles.english: Trying my absolute hardest every day,

subtitles.original: やっとここまで連れて来たんだ
subtitles.english: I finally brought myself this far.

subtitles.original: あなたには分からない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かって欲しくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My hardships...

subtitles.original: 不満もどうかご存じないでいてね
subtitles.english: Please don't pretend to know my dissatisfaction either.

subtitles.original: 「きっとあなたにも出来るはず」なんてさ
subtitles.english: "I'm sure you can do it too," they say.

subtitles.original: 言うほど無責任にはなりたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be as irresponsible as those words.

subtitles.original: それでも死ぬほど頑張って
subtitles.english: Still, trying my absolute hardest,

subtitles.original: 賭ける値打ちはあると思った
subtitles.english: I thought there was value in betting on it.

subtitles.original: 投げ出したくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to give up.

subtitles.original: でも諦めたくはない
subtitles.english: But I don't want to quit.

subtitles.original: 私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future,

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部 私だけのもの
subtitles.english: and my failures, they all belong only to me.

subtitles.original: あなたには分からない
subtitles.english: You wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かって欲しくない
subtitles.english: I don't want you to understand.

subtitles.original: 私の苦労も
subtitles.english: My hardships...

subtitles.original: 不満もどうかご存じないでいてね
subtitles.english: Please don't pretend to know my dissatisfaction either.
